mention.text: Drexel Burnham Lambert Inc. on Thursday
Milken , 42 , who has been on a leave of absence from Drexel since March 29 , on Thursday submitted his resignation .
a lawyer with the Los Angeles firm of Irell & Manella
Milken , his brother and several other partners
Milken , who earned amounts ranging up to $ 550 million per year at Drexel
Milken , his brother and former Drexel trader Bruce L. Newberg
the only company I 've worked for since graduating from college
his new firm , International Capital Access Group
` Very Emotional Experience ' The timing of Milken 's resignation
civil insider-trading and securities fraud charges brought by the Securities and Exchange Commission
to continue to help -LRB- people he has done business with or offered advice to -RRB-
Milken started out in 1969 as a part-time employee
the only one I ever expected to work for
a multitude of deals at once
former Drexel trader Bruce L. Newberg
former stock speculator Ivan F. Boesky
Boesky , suspected of widespread insider trading
